fields.name: Black Gym Top
fields.description: This black women's gym top is made with a moisture-wicking fabric to keep you cool and dry during your workout. It features a slim fit design with a scoop neckline and a racerback cut for maximum mobility. The top is made with a stretchy, breathable material that moves with you as you exercise. The fabric is also quick drying and easy to care for, making it perfect for active women. This top is a great choice for any type of workout, from yoga to running to weightlifting
